channel.title: Apc Models on Paul C. Lambert
channel.description: Recent content in Apc Models on Paul C. Lambert

item.title: Course: Cancer Predictions: Model-based approaches using Stata
item.description: I am teaching a 1 day course with Mark Rutherford on the use of Age Period Cohort (APC) models for predictions of cancer incidence an mortality. This take place before the Intenational Association of Cancer Registries conference in Utrect on 16th October 2017.
